channel.title: Compiler wont work
channel.description: ok everythime i try to complie i allways get this: 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . . and i dont have run&compile i have run server and a seperate file named compile.[br][size=1]Posted at: October 22, 2006, 11:14:32 PM[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Compiler wont work

item.title: Compiler wont work
item.dc:creator: @catharsis catharsis
item.description:
@catharsis wrote:

put all ur files in the most updated jdk bin

open up your folder with source and run and all that in it.
select them all
ctrl + A
then
ctrl + C
now go
start
my computer
local disk (C:)
programme files
java
then find your most recent jdk folder
open it
open bin
paste the files you previously selected in there.

now your ready, compile, run.

if not then post here

Read full topic
